member.name: REPAIR_COPIES_OUTPUT
member.summary: Contains output of a repair copies operation returned from theFSCTL_REPAIR_COPIES control code.

member.name: REPAIR_COPIES_OUTPUT.Status
member.summary: Indicates the status of the repair operation. The value is a NTSTATUS value. Seehttp://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc704588(PROT.10).aspxfor a list of NTSTATUS values.

member.name: REPAIR_COPIES_OUTPUT.ResumeFileOffset
member.summary: If the Status member indicates the operation was not successful, this is the file offset to use to resume repair operations, skipping the range where errors were found.
